edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model

Class Thing

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model.Thing
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Item, Place, Player

    public abstract class Thing
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a thing, which is associated with other things, in a World instance. A World must have 2 or more things: One Place and One Player

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Thing(World world, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String article, java.lang.String description)
      Constructs a new instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Thing

        public Thing(World world,
     java.lang.String name,
     java.lang.String article,
     java.lang.String description)
        Constructs a new instance. Only to be invoked by the World class.
        Parameters:
        world - the World instance this exists within.
        name - a non-null unique name for the instance. The uniqueness of the name can't be dependent upon case, e.g., "Hall" is considered the same as "hall".
        article - the appropriate non-null indefinite article with which to prefix the name so as to form a proper short description, e.g., "the" or "a".
        description - a long, possibly mult-line, non-null description of this thing.

        Gets the article of this. This refers to the appropriate indefinite article with which to prefix the name so as to form a proper short description, e.g., "the" or "a".
